title: How to Convince People to Go Skinny Dipping

steps.headline: Remember that before you go in the water naked, you have to be confident.
Invite some close friends over for dinner and socializing.
"Forget" to tell one or two of the guys that you all planned on going swimming.
When they act embarrassed or apologetic and say they can't go, just tell them that you don't want to leave them out.
Suggest that they can just go without suits.
steps.description: If they decline, tell them you will go without a suit as well so they're not alone.

steps.headline: If they still don't want to go, tell them they can wear your suit and you'll go naked.
steps.description: As the evening goes on, eventually some of your friends will decide to give it a try.

steps.headline: If people begin to laugh, gawk, or get grossed out, just say, "It runs in my family.
steps.description: I'm not ashamed. Why are you mocking me anyway?" They will begin to feel bad and a few more people will join you.

steps.headline: Eventually everyone will be naked (except maybe one or two "holdouts").
Enjoy your evening naked with your friends because being naked is fun and healthy.
Another method.
steps.description: When you are swimming with your friends, tell them the idea then take your top off slowly. Hopefully they will follow.
